page.title: 16DUNSFORD C.P.SCHOOL
page.content: Log books and admission registers go back to 1870 but there was a school in the village for many years before that.Present building completed 1873. It continued as an all-age school until secondary reorganisation when it became J.& I.,the older children going to Chagford S.M. Now at 11yrs.children transfer to Teign Comprehensive Sch. The school now has 40 on roll with a headteacher and one assistant teacher. Meals are cooked on the premises. The school has its own swimming pool, playing field and large environmental studies area in the school grounds. There is a very active and supportive Parent/Teacher Association.
